abstract: 200,000 Brit registered for evacuation, 32,000 to U S; U S Com for Care of Eur Children fund drive luncheon, N Y C; M Field on U S immigration easing; E H Biddle o??? plans
snippet: With 200,000 children in the British Isles registered for evacuation-- 32,000 of them to this countryplans were speeded here yesterday to give every possible assistance....

headline.main: 200,000 Children Seek Haven; Drive Here Asks Funds for Them; Leaders in Every Field Are Enlisted in $5,000,000 Campaign to Rescue Them From War-Threatened Britain 200,000 Children Seek Haven From War's Perils; Drive for $5,000,000 to Aid Them Is Started Here No Intention to "Meddle" Pamphlet Is Issued A Plea for Prompt Aid Good Care Is Chief Aim Pledges of Aid Given

lead_paragraph: With 200,000 children in the British Isles registered for evacuation-- 32,000 of them to this countryplans were speeded here yesterday to give every possible assistance.
